title: pvp.net patcher kernel has stopped working
body:
So have been getting this message for some time now. I don't run as admin and I uninstalled and then reinstalled and nothing. Is there anything that I might have missed or need to do.

The message goes as follows: PVP.net Patcher kernel has stopped working. A problem cause the program to stop working correctly. Windows will close the program and notify you if a solution is available.{{champion:222}}

replies.body: This error is usually caused by security settings on your pc that's preventing game files from being accessed.  Going through the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should fix it up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
